New Records: Glenn Maxwell broke the record for the fastest World Cup hundred with 106 off 44 balls
David Warner scored his sixth World Cup hundred and the highest score of 399
Key Match Events: Australia posted the highest score of 399 in the World Cup
Adam Zampa registered a third four-for in the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of 18,000 spectators
Australia's 399 was the highest score by any team in the World Cup
